body.name: Laundry Detergent Sheets - 30 Sheets (up to 60 Loads) - Unscented - Ideal for Travel, Baby Clothes - Compact, Liquidless, Hypoallergenic, Eco-Friendly & Plastic-Free Solution.

byLineInfo.name: Visit the Pura Vida Eco Store

Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 8 hrs 38 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: Compact by Design (Certified by Amazon) products remove excess air and water, which reduces the carbon footprint of shipping and packaging.

features: Awesome Clean: Remove stains, odors, sweat, and dirt with Pura Vida's compact, high-powered laundry detergent sheets. No pods, no bulky container, no waste; Just fresh, clean clothes.

Convenience: Washing your clothing with laundry sheets is simple and effective. No need to measure and pour from a heavy dispenser jug. Simply add a premeasured sheet to your washer and run the cycle.

Gentle: Our laundry cleaner sheets are pH neutral with an active liquid enzyme rather than harsh soaps. The concentrated ingredients are free from phosphorus, dioxane, or harsh chemicals, suitable for all skin types, including babies.
Sustainable Packaging: Recycled paper boxes are biodegradable and eco-conscious. Traditional laundry detergent bottles are heavy, wasteful, and made of hard plastics that add to waste in our oceans.
Space Saving Solution: The low-profile, lightweight box is great for small spaces and bulk storage. Carry to the laundromat or travel with ease. No need for a 5 gallon jug and messy liquids.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Kind of Amazing
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for hand washing essentials when traveling, but tried it here at home for bras, and then a tote bag. The amount of dirt in the bottom of the dish pan was kind of amazing. It is an enzymatic cleaner and I think that makes a difference. I did use it with a submersible ultrasound washing device. I have not used it in a washing machine yet, but I am really happy with the hand washing results.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product for travel
reviews.reviewText: Perfect for traveling. Used for laundry while at a villa in Italy. So easy to pack, did great washing clothes , good value for the price. I may use this product at home sometimes as it's easy to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cleans Well, Unscented and Hypoallergenic, Takes 2 Sheets for a Large Load
reviews.reviewText: These detergent sheets dissolve into fragments as soon as they are hit with water, but they need to be submerged to completely dissolve. The water didn’t feel soapy with just one sheet, so I’ll probably always use two with my usual large loads. Although these unscented sheets contain no fragrance to mask odors, I only found one garment that still smelled faintly when spot checking. The load contained synthetic shirts, underwear, and hiking/camping socks, so I felt the laundry sheets passed the cleaning test. There was also a ball cap with a sweaty headband which I pre-treated with stain remover, but the stain remained. In addition to reducing plastic in most households, these take up less room, and will travel with me if I need to do laundry on a trip. As for price, I’m probably only going to get 30 loads for the current $15 price (50 cents per load). Given the convenience of home delivery and the form factor, that’s not too bad compared to my powdered detergent from the big box store which could be as low as 25 cents per load, but is probably slightly higher, and would be higher still if it was formulated for sensitive skin. I’m impressed with these and would recommend them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great New Laundry Solution - Works Great and is Super Easy...Good for Planet
reviews.reviewText: I think Pura Vida Laundry sheets are awesome. Why haven’t I been doing this for years? My kids just got back from college and we have lots of laundry and a friend told me about them. I like the eco-friendly aspect and not having to haul a large bottle of detergent from grocery store to our home etc. Our clothes came out really clean and smelled fresh. The sheets dissolve easily. We used a large sheet for big load and a half sheet for smaller loads…I gave each of my kids a some to take with them for the summer as they are working in different locations. That said, it is a great travel product and my husband is taking some with him on a camping trip…Over all a great product - I’d recommend to a friend, definitely!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Go green with detergent
reviews.reviewText: Go green with these wash sheets..ditch the big plastic jugs that end up in the oceans...or those pods....this product is GREAT...get it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for campers, vacationers, or just at home!
reviews.reviewText: These laundry sheets have been a vacation sanity saver this summer so far! We travel a lot with our 3 kids. Mostly camping and it is so annoying to lug around a big plastic bottle of detergent. Many a cap not tightened and liquid spills in the gear! Or buy the little boxes of powder in the laundromat machines that never fully wash out and end up with streaks of dried powder on clothes after drying. As you can imagine, all the camp set up, hiking, biking, etc. will test your deodorant, and win. Clothing and bedding get dirty quick! And the camp fire smoke smell. While making s’mores and drinking wine around the campfire at the end of the day is a must to any camping trip, the clothing really takes on the strong smoke smell and is not so pleasant to wear the next day.We try to not pack much per person, so washing frequently is imperative.These sheets were perfect for this past month long trip. So easy to slip the pack envelope if sheets into our gear and have at the ready when coming across a laundromat. Not only was the ease of just throwing the sheet into washer, our clothes always came out clean and NO smelly odors!! Unbelievable with 3 kids exceeding their normal wear and tear on their clothing for dirt and smell!I highly recommend these for any camper, vacationer, or just at home.Another huge plus for us is knowing we are not adding to the land fills with big plastic detergent bottles. On a normal basis at home we go through a big red bottle of blue detergent once a month. That plastic adds up. I’m sold on this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Does as well if not better than liquid detergent. Very transportable, great for college students, retirees, and travelers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Convenience and they perform well at removing under arm odors
reviews.reviewText: I've really started getting accustomed more or less and liking using detergent sheets although initially I was skeptical due to how the come and feel when you are holding the sheets. Thinking "this" is going to actually clean my clothes? They dissolve almost immediately when in contact with water in the bottom of your washer drum. I have a top loading type. I typically use 2 full sheets due to my clothes being more soiled than normal from work, that and I do larger loads besides.I've been happy with the results using these they do a good job with removing the smell left from your deodorant and/or sweaty pits. I can't speak for those that use antiperspirant as far as how it builds up on clothes being I only need deodorant.
